t, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Panthenol, Allantoin, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Ascorbyl Palmitate (C-Ester), Dimethicone, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer (AristoflexÂ®), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Essential Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate.

tly pat around the entire orbital area up to your eyebrow.
